task.title: Editing Sound Display
task.shortdesc: Correct or refine the AI's pronunciation analysis.

context.p: Sometimes the AI makes mistakes in phonetic analysis. You can manually correct the sound_display values.

step.cmd: Switch to Sound Display mode by clicking the button.
Click on a segment to select it for editing.
step.stepresult: The segment's sound_display appears in the input field.

step.cmd: Click inside of the text area to apply changes.
